snippet: The company says the attack was separate from the breach that led to an earlier disclosure that 500 million accounts were hacked....
abstract: Yahoo reveals there was cyberattack in 2013 that compromised accounts of over billion users; disclosure follows earlier admission that 2014 attack exposed 500 million user accounts; two attacks are largest known security breaches of one company's computer network; critics say company has been slow to adopt security measures.

byline.original: By VINDU GOEL and NICOLE PERLROTH

lead_paragraph: The company says the attack was separate from the breach that led to an earlier disclosure that 500 million accounts were hacked.

headline.main: Yahoo Says 1 Billion User Accounts Were Hacked
headline.print_headline: Yahoo Reveals Largest Breach Ever Reported
